channel.title: Snow
channel.description: Do i was follwiwing a tut here http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/357738-adding-snow-xmas-pi.html and i was windering how do.i remove the bits if grass and how do i put snow on objects

item.title: Snow
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

To get rid of the ‘bits of grass’, in your client class, search for ‘setHighMem()’ and you should see:

	private static void setHighMem() {
		WorldController.lowMem = false;
		Texture.lowMem = false;
		lowMem = false;
		ObjectManager.lowMem = false;
		ObjectDef.lowMem = false;
	}

Now you should see:

ObjectManager.lowMem = false;

You want to change that to ‘true’, so it would look like this:

	private static void setHighMem() {
		WorldController.lowMem = false;
		Texture.lowMem = false;
		lowMem = false;
		ObjectManager.lowMem = true;
		ObjectDef.lowMem = false;
	}

Read full topic

item.title: Snow
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Manually hand-edit your Object Models to look like snow is on top of them. Objects you can walk through aren’t considered Objects, but they can still be removed in the same fashion.

Read full topic
